venue.address_1: Corner of Freedom and Hopedale Streets and surrounding area
venue.name: The Little Red Shop Museum

item.description: Starting at the boathouse at the intersection of Hopedale and Dutcher Streets in Hopedale, the Parkland trail circumnavigates the Hopedale town pond and provides a variety of picturesque views. Halfway around is a gorgeous stone bridge that is perfect for a doggy photo shoot! The trail is (relatively) flat and smooth and is a very nice walk! Took me about 1.5 hours at a casual stroll. The trail ends about 0.5 miles from where it starts but is an easy walk back to the beginning on city streets. There is plenty of parking in the area. Leashed dogs are required and come prepared to scoop the poop! For a (very old) map of the Parklands you can click here... http://www.paulhutch.... And for a very extensive preview of the walk you can go here! http://www.hope1842.c...
item.name: Walk the Hopedale Parkland!
